Rods.name: Ceramic Pole Rod
Rods.description: A lightweight rod with ceramic guides.

Rods.name: Bass Pro Rod
Rods.description: A rod made of high-quality materials. It feels good in your hand.

Rods.name: Carbon Fiber Rod
Rods.description: The rod feels like a feather in your hand.

Rods.name: Titanium Rod
Rods.description: A rod made of titanium. The game warden doesn't know if he should be impressed or angry.

Rods.name: Big Game Rod
Rods.description: You can catch a whale with this rod. Just don't let it get away.

Rods.name: Goldenrod
Rods.description: A rod made of pure gold. Fish swarm to the surface to admire it.
